duties_responsibilities.duty: Monitor day to day team activity to ensure prospect standards and proper standards are being followed to achieve goals.
Provide training and coaching on products, call scripts and processes when needed.
Coach and inspire the team to achieve sales goals and objectives.
Manage lead qualification and quality improving Salesforce data.

Oversee team metrics 
– outbound calls and emails, demos set.
Collaborate with Sales Leaders to establish prospecting plans to uncover new business.

education_certification.credential:
Minimum of 3 years selling SaaS preferably as an SDR
At least 1 year Sales leadership experience in Public Safety industry
SDR leadership experience leading team size of at least 5 SDRs
Salesforce expertise (SME)
